name: Acid Splash
description: You hurl a bubble of acid.

name: Blade Ward
description: You extend your hand and trace a sigil of warding in the air.

name: Booming Blade
description: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make a melee attack.

name: Chill Touch
description: You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range.

name: Control Flames
description: You choose nonmagical flame that you can see within range and that fits within a 5-foot cube.

name: Create Bonfire
description: You create a bonfire on ground that you can see within range.

name: Dancing Lights
description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range.

name: Decompose (HB)
description: You touch a dead creature, hastening its decomposition.

name: Druidcraft
description: Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects within range.

name: Eldritch Blast
description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range.

name: Encode Thoughts
description: You pull a memory, an idea, or a message from your mind and transform it into a tangible string of glowing energy.

name: Fire Bolt
description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range.

name: Friends
description: For the duration, you have advantage on all Charisma checks directed at one creature of your choice that isn’t hostile toward you.

name: Frostbite
description: You cause numbing frost to form on one creature that you can see within range.

name: Green-Flame Blade
description: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make a melee attack.

name: Guidance
description: You touch one willing creature.

name: Gust
description: You seize the air and compel it to create one of the following effects at a point you can see within range.

name: Hand of Radiance (UA)
description: You create a burst of radiance that erupts from your hand.

name: Infestation
description: You cause a cloud of mites, fleas, and other parasites to appear momentarily on one creature you can see within range.

name: Light
description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension.

name: Lightning Lure
description: You create a lash of lightning energy that strikes at one creature of your choice that you can see within range.

name: Mage Hand
description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range.

name: Magic Stone
description: You touch one to three pebbles and imbue them with magic.

name: Mending
description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch.

name: Message
description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message.

name: Mind Sliver
description: You drive a disorienting spike of psychic energy into the mind of one creature you can see within range.

name: Minor Illusion
description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration.

name: Mold Earth
description: You choose a portion of dirt or stone that you can see within range and that fits within a 5-foot cube.

name: On/Off (UA)
description: You choose a manufactured object that has no more than 100 pounds and can see within range.

name: Poison Spray
description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm.

name: Prestidigitation
description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice.

name: Primal Savagery
description: You channel primal magic to cause your teeth or fingernails to sharpen, ready to deliver a corrosive attack.

name: Produce Flame
description: A flickering flame appears in your hand.

name: Ray of Frost
description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range.

name: Resistance
description: You touch one willing creature.

name: Sacred Flame
description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range.

name: Sapping Sting
description: You sap the vitality of one creature you can see in range.

name: Shape Water
description: You choose an area of water that you can see within range and that fits within a 5-foot cube.

name: Shillelagh
description: The wood of a club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature’s power.

name: Shocking Grasp
description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch.

name: Spare the Dying
description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points.

name: Sword Burst
description: You create a momentary circle of spectral blades that sweep around you.

name: Thaumaturgy
description: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range.

name: Thorn Whip
description: You create a long, vine-like whip covered in thorns that lashes out at your command toward a creature in range.

name: Thunderclap
description: You create a burst of thunderous sound that can be heard up to 100 feet away.

name: Toll the Dead
description: You point at one creature you can see within range, and the sound of a dolorous bell fills the air around it for a moment.

name: True Strike
description: You point a finger at a target in range.

name: Vicious Mockery
description: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at a creature you can see within range.

name: Virtue (UA)
description: You touch one creature and bolster it with toughness and resolve.

name: Word of Radiance
description: You utter a divine word, and burning radiance erupts from you.

name: Abbathor's Greed
description: Invoke Abbathor’s avarice to compel a creature to steal or acquire something valuable.

name: Abi-Dalzim's Horrid Wilting
description: Drain moisture from creatures, causing severe dehydration and damage.

name: Acererak's Blackstone
description: Conjure a blackstone that can unleash necrotic energy on contact.

name: Agannazar's Scorcher
description: A line of roaring flame blasts out, damaging all in its path.

name: Alahandra's Questing Call
description: Compel a creature to undertake a specific quest or task.

name: Alamanther's Return
description: Return to a location you have previously visited within a specific timeframe.

name: Alaunghaer's Enchanted Triptych
description: Create three magical images that can interact and communicate.

name: Alcimer's Flying Fist
description: Conjure a spectral fist that can strike and grapple enemies.

name: Alimar's Fundamental Breakdown
description: Cause a mechanical or magical device to malfunction or break.

name: Alvira's Stasis Shell
description: Encapsulate a creature in a stasis field, halting all actions and effects.

name: Amgig's Rowers
description: Summon spectral rowers to propel a boat or ship.

name: Amvid's Unseen Limb
description: Create an invisible limb that can manipulate objects and perform tasks.

name: Archveult's Skybolt
description: Call down a powerful bolt of lightning from the sky.

name: Argaster's Cloak of Shadows
description: Shroud yourself in shadows, granting increased stealth and protection from light-based attacks.

name: Auril's Flowers
description: Summon icy flowers that can entangle and freeze enemies.

name: Avissar's Flaming Weapon
description: Imbue a weapon with fire, causing additional fire damage on hit.

name: Azuth's Exalted Triad
description: Create three duplicates of yourself to aid in spellcasting and combat.

name: Azuth's Fendsor
description: Create a magical shield that can deflect spells and projectiles.

name: Azuth's Spellshield
description: Create a protective barrier that can absorb and reflect magical attacks.

name: Balagarn's Iron Horn
description: Produce a deafening blast that can shatter objects and deafen creatures.

name: Ballant's Stonesplit
description: Create a seismic shockwave that can split and shatter stone.

name: Ballant's Stonestrength
description: Grant a creature the strength and durability of stone.

name: Bands of Sirellyn
description: Summon magical bands that can bind and restrain a creature.

name: Barlen's Crabwalk
description: Allow a creature to move sideways at increased speed, mimicking a crab's movement.

name: Belorigar's Baldric
description: Create a magical baldric that grants enhanced defense and spell resistance.

name: Belsham's Mace
description: Conjure a magical mace that deals additional force damage on hit.

name: Beltyn's Burning Blood
description: Cause a creature’s blood to burn, dealing fire damage over time.

name: Berronar's Favor
description: Bless a creature with divine protection and increased healing.

name: Bigby's Battering Gauntlet
description: Summon a massive magical gauntlet that can strike and push enemies.

name: Bigby's Besieging Bolt
description: Fire a powerful bolt of force that can breach fortifications.

name: Bigby's Bookworm Bane
description: Create a spectral hand that can destroy books and scrolls.

name: Bigby's Clenched Fist
description: Conjure a giant fist that can punch and grapple enemies.

name: Bigby's Construction Crew
description: Summon multiple hands to aid in construction and repair tasks.

name: Bigby's Crushing Hand
description: Create a giant hand that can crush and immobilize a target.

name: Bigby's Dextrous Digits
description: Summon precise magical hands for delicate tasks and manipulations.

name: Bigby's Fantastic Fencers
description: Create spectral swordsmen to duel and defend.

name: Bigby's Feeling Fingers
description: Summon magical fingers that can sense hidden objects and traps.

name: Bigby's Force Sculpture
description: Create complex sculptures out of force energy.

name: Bigby's Forceful Hand
description: Summon a hand that can push or pull creatures and objects.

name: Bigby's Grasping Hand
description: Create a hand that can grapple and hold enemies.

name: Bigby's Interposing Eye
description: Summon an eye that can see and block incoming attacks.

name: Bigby's Interposing Hand
description: Create a hand that provides cover and protection.

name: Bigby's Protective Pentad
description: Summon five hands that create a defensive barrier.

name: Bigby's Pugnacious Pugilist
description: Create a magical boxer that fights on your behalf.

name: Bigby's Silencing Hand
description: Summon a hand that can silence and mute targets.

name: Bigby's Strangling Grip
description: Conjure a hand that can choke and suffocate a creature.

name: Bigby's Striking Fist
description: Create a powerful hand that delivers forceful blows.

name: Bigby's Superior Force Sculpture
description: Create highly detailed and intricate sculptures from force energy.

name: Bigby's Warding Hand
description: Summon a hand that deflects attacks and projectiles.

name: Bigby's Wrenching Hand
description: Create a hand that can twist and disarm enemies.

name: Blackstaff
description: Create a powerful staff imbued with dark magic.

name: Blade of Disruption
description: Summon a blade that disrupts and damages magical constructs.

name: Blizzard of Oz
description: Conjure a fierce blizzard that disorients and damages foes.

name: Bloom
description: Cause plants to grow rapidly, entangling and hindering enemies.

name: Body Blades
description: Transform parts of your body into sharp blades for melee attacks.

name: Bolt from the Blue
description: Summon a sudden bolt of lightning from a clear sky.

name: Bolts of Bedevilment
description: Shoot multiple magical bolts that can confuse and harm targets.

name: Boneblade
description: Create a sword made of bone that deals necrotic damage.

name: Bonefire
description: Summon a fire that burns with necrotic energy.

name: Bonefiddle
description: Create a skeletal violin that can manipulate the dead.

name: Boomerang Comet
description: Launch a comet that returns to you after striking its target.

name: Bralm's Buzzing Bombardment
description: Summon a swarm of bees to attack and distract enemies.

name: Bralm's Insect Plague
description: Conjure a plague of insects that swarm and damage foes.

name: Brandobaris' Borrowing
description: Temporarily borrow an object or item from another creature.

name: Brightmantle's Mind Vault
description: Store and protect your thoughts and memories in a secure magical vault.

name: Bryce's Elemental Blast
description: Unleash a blast of elemental energy, choosing between fire, cold, lightning, or acid.

name: Catapsi
description: Create a field that dampens and weakens psychic powers.

name: Cast in Stone
description: Turn a creature to stone, petrifying them.

name: Caustic Fount
description: Create a geyser of acid that damages and corrodes.

name: Cavaria's Bolt
description: Shoot a magical bolt that can pierce through multiple targets.

name: Celestial Flame
description: Summon holy fire to smite evil creatures.

name: Chauntea's Blessing
description: Call upon the goddess to bless crops and promote growth.

name: Chill of Borem
description: Create an aura of extreme cold that slows and damages enemies.

name: Circle of Blindness
description: Create a field that blinds all creatures within it.

name: Claws of the Umber Hulk
description: Grow powerful claws that can burrow through earth and stone.

name: Clenched Fist
description: Create a magical fist that can strike and crush enemies.

name: Clone
description: Create a duplicate of yourself that can act independently.

name: Cloud of Daggers
description: Summon a cloud of spinning daggers that damage creatures within it.

name: Cloudkill
description: Create a cloud of poisonous gas that moves away from you, harming those caught within it.

name: Conjure Elemental
description: Summon an elemental to fight on your behalf.

name: Control Weather
description: Alter the weather conditions in a large area.

name: Corpse Explosion
description: Cause a corpse to explode, damaging nearby creatures.

name: Creeping Doom
description: Summon a swarm of insects that obey your commands.

name: Crown of Stars
description: Create a crown of glowing stars that can be used as magical projectiles.

name: Crushing Despair
description: Cause a wave of despair to wash over creatures, imposing penalties.

name: Cure Wounds
description: Heal a creature you touch.

name: Curse of the Azure Bonds
description: Curse a creature with magical bonds that limit their actions.

name: Cyclonic Blast
description: Create a powerful wind that can knock back and damage creatures.

name: Darkstar
description: Create a miniature black hole that pulls in and crushes enemies.

name: Dawn
description: Create a beam of sunlight that damages undead and fiends.

name: Delayed Blast Fireball
description: Create a powerful explosion that can be delayed for a short time.

name: Demi-Shadow Magic
description: Create quasi-real illusions that can affect the physical world.

name: Destruction
description: Cause a target to disintegrate into dust.

name: Detect Magic
description: Sense the presence of magic within 30 feet.

name: Disintegrate
description: Reduce a creature or object to a pile of fine dust.

name: Dispel Magic
description: End a spell or magical effect.

name: Divine Favor
description: Empower your attacks with divine energy.

name: Divine Power
description: Grant yourself divine strength and endurance.

name: Dominate Monster
description: Exert control over a creature, making it obey your commands.

name: Dominate Person
description: Exert control over a humanoid, making it obey your commands.

name: Drawmij's Instant Summons
description: Instantly summon an object to your hand.

name: Dragon's Breath
description: Grant a creature the ability to breathe a specific type of energy in a cone.

name: Druid Grove
description: Create a protective grove with magical effects.

name: Earthquake
description: Create a massive earthquake that can cause widespread destruction.

name: Elemental Bane
description: Curse a creature to take extra damage from a specific elemental type.

name: Elemental Weapon
description: Imbue a weapon with a specific elemental energy.

name: Elminster's Evasion
description: Teleport to avoid an attack or spell.

name: Elminster's Effulgent Epuration
description: Create a field that absorbs and nullifies magical effects.

name: Elminster's Merciless Missiles
description: Summon multiple magical missiles that strike unerringly.

name: Elminster's Undying Army
description: Summon undead minions to fight for you.

name: Elminster's Whirling Wheels
description: Create spinning wheels of force that can block and damage enemies.

name: Elric's Thunderous Applause
description: Create a deafening sound that can deafen and damage foes.

name: Empyreal Ecstasy
description: Induce a state of pure bliss and euphoria in a creature.

name: Ethereal Jaunt
description: Shift into the Ethereal Plane for a short time.

name: Evard's Black Tentacles
description: Summon dark tentacles that grapple and crush enemies.

name: Feather Fall
description: Slow the rate of descent for a falling creature.

name: Finger of Death
description: Deal massive necrotic damage, potentially killing a creature.

name: Fireball
description: Create a burst of fire that explodes, dealing damage in an area.

name: Flame Strike
description: Summon a column of divine fire to smite enemies.

name: Floating Disc
description: Create a floating, circular plane of force to carry loads.

name: Flesh to Stone
description: Turn a creature into stone, petrifying them.

name: Foresight
description: Grant yourself or a willing creature the limited ability to see into the immediate future.

name: Freedom of Movement
description: You or a willing creature is no longer affected by difficult terrain. Spells and other magical effects can neither reduce the target's speed nor cause the target to be paralyzed or restrained.

name: Hold Monster
description: Paralyze a creature, preventing it from taking actions.

name: Hold Person
description: Paralyze a humanoid, preventing it from taking actions.

name: Holy Aura
description: Surround yourself with an aura of divine light, granting defensive benefits.

name: Holy Smite
description: Strike a target with divine power, dealing radiant damage.

name: Hypnotic Pattern
description: Create a pattern of hypnotic lights that charms creatures.

name: Ice Storm
description: Summon a storm of ice that damages and hinders movement.

name: Identify
description: Learn the properties of a magical item or effect.

name: Illusory Dragon
description: Create a phantasmal dragon that terrifies and harms enemies.

name: Immolation
description: Engulf a target in magical flames that deal ongoing damage.

name: Incendiary Cloud
description: Create a cloud of smoke and fire that damages creatures within it.

name: Invisibility
description: Turn yourself or another creature invisible.

name: Invulnerability
description: Become immune to all damage for a short duration.

name: Legend Lore
description: Learn tales and information about a person, place, or object.

name: Levitate
description: Cause a creature or object to rise into the air.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Shoot a bolt of lightning that damages creatures in its path.

name: Mage Armor
description: Create a magical force that protects you, increasing your AC.

name: Mage Hand
description: Create a spectral hand that can manipulate objects.

name: Magic Missile
description: Shoot unerring bolts of magical force at a target.

name: Mass Cure Wounds
description: Heal multiple creatures within an area.

name: Mass Heal
description: Restore a massive amount of health to multiple creatures.

name: Mass Suggestion
description: Make a compelling suggestion to multiple creatures.

name: Meteor Swarm
description: Summon four meteors that explode, causing massive damage.

name: Mind Blank
description: Protect a creature from all mind-affecting spells and effects.

name: Mirage Arcane
description: Create an illusory landscape that seems completely real.

name: Mirror Image
description: Create duplicates of yourself to confuse attackers.

name: Mislead
description: Turn invisible while creating an illusory double.

name: Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion
description: Create an extradimensional mansion that you can reside in.

name: Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum
description: Create a magical barrier that prevents scrying and teleportation.

name: Mordenkainen's Sword
description: Summon a magical sword that attacks your enemies.

name: Move Earth
description: Reshape dirt, sand, and clay in a large area.

name: Power Word Kill
description: Instantly kill a creature with 100 hit points or fewer.

name: Power Word Stun
description: Stun a creature with 150 hit points or fewer.

name: Prismatic Spray
description: Shoot beams of multicolored light that cause various effects.

name: Prismatic Wall
description: Create a wall of shimmering colors that blocks and harms creatures.

name: Raise Dead
description: Return a dead creature to life with a significant amount of healing.

name: Rary's Telepathic Bond
description: Create a telepathic link between willing creatures.

name: Regenerate
description: Heal a creature and allow them to regrow lost body parts.

name: Resurrection
description: Return a dead creature to life with full health.

name: Reverse Gravity
description: Reverse gravity in an area, causing creatures and objects to fall upwards.

name: Sacred Flame
description: Summon divine fire to damage an enemy.

name: Scorching Ray
description: Shoot rays of fire that damage multiple targets.

name: Scrying
description: See and hear a distant location or creature.

name: Shapechange
description: Transform into a different creature or object.

name: Shield
description: Create a magical barrier that increases your AC.

name: Shocking Grasp
description: Deliver a jolt of electricity to a creature you touch.

name: Silence
description: Create a zone of silence where no sound can be made.

name: Simulacrum
description: Create an illusory duplicate of a creature.

name: Sleep
description: Put creatures into a magical slumber.

name: Slow
description: Alter time for up to six creatures, slowing their movements and actions.

name: Spider Climb
description: Grant a creature the ability to move up walls and across ceilings.

name: Spiritual Weapon
description: Create a floating, spectral weapon that attacks enemies.

name: Stinking Cloud
description: Create a cloud of nauseating gas that can incapacitate creatures.

name: Storm of Vengeance
description: Summon a storm that deals various types of damage and impairs enemies.

name: Suggestion
description: Compel a creature to follow a course of action.

name: Sunbeam
description: Create a beam of radiant light that damages and blinds creatures.

name: Sunburst
description: Create a blinding flash of radiant light that damages and blinds creatures.

name: Symbol
description: Create a magical glyph that triggers a harmful effect.

name: Telekinesis
description: Move or manipulate objects and creatures with your mind.

name: Teleport
description: Instantly transport yourself and up to eight willing creatures to a known location.

name: Time Stop
description: Briefly stop time for everyone but yourself.

name: Tsunami
description: Summon a massive wave of water that damages and pushes creatures.

name: True Resurrection
description: Return a creature to life with all its hit points restored.

name: True Seeing
description: Grant a creature the ability to see things as they actually are.

name: Vampiric Touch
description: Deal necrotic damage to a creature and regain hit points.

name: Wall of Fire
description: Create a wall of fire that damages creatures within it.

name: Wall of Force
description: Create an invisible wall of force that blocks creatures and objects.

name: Wall of Ice
description: Create a wall of ice that can block movement and deal damage.

name: Wall of Stone
description: Create a wall of stone that can be shaped to your desire.

name: Warding Bond
description: Create a magical bond that protects a creature and shares its damage with you.

name: Weird
description: Create phantasmal images that terrify and damage creatures.

name: Wish
description: Alter reality to your desire.

name: Word of Recall
description: Teleport to a designated sanctuary with up to five willing creatures.

name: Wrath of Nature
description: Call upon the forces of nature to attack your enemies.

name: Zone of Truth
description: Create a zone where creatures cannot lie.
